p:
Calanus finmarchicus undergoes a complex life cycle consisting of six nauplii stages and five copepodite stages before reaching maturity
10 . During copepodite stage 5, C. finmarchicus in the Gulf of Maine enter diapause and overwinter at ~100–400 m, surviving on stored lipid reserves
11, 12 . In the spring, it comes out of diapause, moves towards the surface and reproduces, timing the end of diapause slightly before the onset of the spring phytoplankton bloom
13, 14 .
